title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
OB: When I click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the hyperlink builder. 
2. Make some changes to the settings. 
3. Click on 'OK'. 
4. Close the hyperlink builder. 
5. Reopen the hyperlink builder and observe the title.
